HomePage.title: CMYZU
HomePage.subtitle: Committed to cultivating outstanding talents with international perspectives, innovative thinking, and social responsibility, providing students with the highest quality educational environment and learning resources
HomePage.badge: Excellence in Education • Innovation for the Future

Stats.title: Global Business Education Leader
Stats.description: To help students connect with the international workplace, we actively build an international environment

Features.title: Why Choose Us
Features.description: We are committed to providing a comprehensive educational experience that enables every student to reach their potential
Features.academic_desc: Offering diverse academic programs that cultivate students' critical thinking and independent learning abilities
Features.innovation_desc: Actively promoting scientific research and innovation, collaborating with top international universities
Features.global_desc: Providing rich international exchange opportunities to cultivate globally competitive talents
Features.career_desc: Comprehensive career guidance and industry-academia cooperation to ensure student employment success

News.title: Latest News
News.description: Stay updated with campus activities and important announcements
News.news_1_title: New Academic Year Opening Ceremony on September 1st
News.news_1_excerpt: Welcome new students to the CMYZU family, featuring renowned international scholars...
News.news_2_title: Graduate School Launches AI and Big Data Master's Program
News.news_2_excerpt: Responding to market demands, adding cutting-edge technology graduate programs...
News.news_3_title: Our Students Win Gold at International Mathematics Competition
News.news_3_excerpt: Congratulations to our mathematics students for their outstanding performance in the International Mathematical Olympiad...
News.news_4_title: NTU Special Course Series - International College 'Beyond Classroom: Field-based Disaster Prevention and Sustainability'
News.news_4_excerpt: Field-based teaching courses lead students to understand disaster prevention in depth...
News.news_5_title: Light and Dream Building - NTU 'Dream Theater' First Light Show Successfully Concluded
News.news_5_excerpt: Campus cultural activities showcase students' creativity and artistic talents...
News.news_6_title: Taipei Youth Development Office X NTU D-School 'Crossing Borders: International Exchange and Internship Experience Sharing'
News.news_6_excerpt: Youth international exchange experience sharing, expanding global perspectives...

Explore.title: Explore CMYZU Business School
Explore.description: Discover our school features, faculty excellence, and international educational environment
Explore.item_1_description: Focusing on the latest developments and important achievements of the College of Management, including academic research breakthroughs, industry-academia collaboration results, and outstanding performances by faculty and students.
Explore.item_2_description: Innovative practice-oriented course design that combines industrial internships, international exchanges, and interdisciplinary learning to cultivate students' practical abilities and global competitiveness.
Explore.item_3_description: Rich and diverse campus activities and academic lectures, including corporate visits, international symposiums, student competitions, and cultural exchanges.

Departments.title: Departments & Programs
Departments.description: Diverse academic fields cultivating the professional knowledge and skills needed for future leaders
Departments.department_1_description: Cultivating professional management talents with comprehensive management knowledge and practical capabilities, covering strategic management, marketing management, and human resource management.
Departments.department_2_description: Combining information technology with management knowledge to cultivate information management professionals needed in the digital age, emphasizing AI and big data applications.
Departments.department_3_description: Focusing on financial market analysis, investment and financial planning, risk management and other professional fields to cultivate financial professionals.
Departments.department_4_description: Cultivating international business talents with global perspectives and cross-cultural communication capabilities, emphasizing adaptability in the globalized business environment.

Footer.address: Address: No. 180, Sec. 1, Keelung Rd., Xinyi Dist., Taipei City, Taiwan

SEO.defaultDescription: Providing comprehensive academic information, educational resources, and student services

ChangePasswordPage.title: Change Password
ChangePasswordPage.subtitle: Set a new password for your account
ChangePasswordPage.enter-new-password: Please enter new password (at least 6 characters)
ChangePasswordPage.tip-1: Password must be at least 6 characters long
ChangePasswordPage.tip-2: We recommend using a combination of uppercase, lowercase letters and numbers
ChangePasswordPage.tip-3: Change your password regularly to keep your account secure

MoreHighlights.title: More Exciting Highlights
MoreHighlights.description: Follow our official social media channels to stay updated with the latest campus news and exciting moments.

TalentDevelopment.title: Cultivating the Most International Business Professionals
TalentDevelopment.description: We are committed to cultivating business professionals with global vision, practical capabilities, and innovative spirit. Through an international teaching environment and rich internship opportunities, we build professional competencies for students to succeed on the world stage.
TalentDevelopment.success_stories_description: Our graduates shine in top companies around the world, and their success proves the excellence of our educational quality.

Newsletter.title: Newsletter Section
Newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to get the latest school news, event information, and important announcements first.
Newsletter.success: Successfully subscribed! Thank you for your support
Newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy and will never share your email address with third parties. You can unsubscribe at any time.

annualReport.title: Annual Report Downloads
annualReport.description: Download our latest annual reports to learn about the college's achievements and future plans
annualReport.note: Files are in PDF format. Adobe Reader is recommended for viewing

FeaturedResources.title: Featured Resources
FeaturedResources.description: Explore our featured resources and services to provide comprehensive support for your learning and development.
